message.body: Hello cutie :)
Hi sweetie, what's up?
What time should I be somewhere?
If you could get to Nicole's place by 8pm or so, that would be perfect! Lemme look up the address for you
Yeah that would be useful I guess..... =p
Thanks sweetie :)
So what r u up to today?
I'm getting coffee with Dan now, heading up to Nicole's in a bit to help her move more stuff in. =) What about you?
I'm debating getting out of bed now =p lol
You've passed on your ability to sleep to me! I woke up at 11.....
Way to go sweetie, I'm proud of u =p haha
Haha, thank you. =P How have you been?

Good, busy running around, went down the shore yesterday and visited people and had dinner with aunt Kathy and uncle Dennis and uncle jack and aunt Peggy and it was delicious and then joe and uncle jack had a huge discussion over something about the school system and pensions, 3 and a half bottles of wine were drunken =p
That sounds absolutely delightful! Your guys are nuts =P
I agree, it was a very heated discussion but joe was awesome lol
I LOVE DRUNK JOE. He wins everything
He just gets better and better as he drinks! Lol
I'm so happy I get to spend New Years with you ☺
I'm excited :) it's gonna be a good time :)
Maybe, we'll see haha
Trololol WUT....
Haha I somehow knew that wouldn't be a problem =p
Haha....and Christie hasn't even brought hers over
Dear lord... Lolz
Yeah this is gonna fun =p lolz
Hahaha. What are you up to now?
Watching The Muppets!!!!
GOOD MOVIE!! I might be getting a muppet poster for my room =P
Lolz Idk where ur gonna put it but sounds like a good plan to me =p
On the wall!! Haha
I didnt think u had any room on those walls =p
In my home bedroom, no. In my dorm and/or my guest room at Woodbridge....yes =P
Ah yes indeed, I didn't think of that =p
Gonna have my stuff split between 3 locations this semester....oops
U b fiiiine =p
Y would he be invited?
He texted me last night saying he was looking for New Years plans.....Nicole and I felt bad and said he could come if he wanted
Sigh... He's gonna drink and be annoying =p lolz
Haha....I haven't seen him drunk, is he annoying?
He was drinking at Nicole's birthday party!!
Oh shoot, I forgot. Haha. He's a mess when he drinks
Indeed... Lolz
Will you be needing to shower here? I brought you an extra towel regardless =P
No I'm good, I already showered today =p lol
So did I, but Nicole was like "YOU WILL ALL NEED TO SHOWER"....I was like "okay......."
I mean if we got to shower together I might be a little more obliged buuuuuut I'm just spitting semantics =p
If only Nicole didn't have a huge problem with people having shower sex =P
Haha I mean it is her house.. Lolz
Yeah yeah. I can't in good conscience =P
Lol I'm sure it won't be a problem =p
Haha. Maybe someday when I'm there and she's not =P
Maybe maybe one day =p I'm bringing candy as a house warming gift =p
That sounds delightful, it will be much appreciated =)
What's her favorite?
"anything"! She just doesn't really like straight chocolate without anything mixed in. Everything else is fair games
Fruity candy it is =p
You called?
I'm bringing multiple things
Everything is great I am on my way now
Okay! Haha. Everything good?
Yay! =) Try to park in front of the gazebo/playground - that'll be closest to the apartment. Call me when you're here and I'll meet you downstairs
Made it home :)
Yay! I'm so glad you were able to come over =)
It was a good time :)
I love when I get out of work 2 hours late (aka now)....
Awe poor baby :(
It's all good, got to Charlay's and now we're watching Pitch Perfect...why are you up!?
Bucky's last night, I've been reading really =p "The Dwarves" it's so good and in only halfway through =p
That's awesome! =) I almost asked "what's it about", but it seems explained by the title
Yeeeaaaaah but it's so good!!! And it's part of a series :)
Oh cool! Look at you, being all literary, my little bookworm
Lolz but I think I'll be heading to bed shortly, watching twilight zone episodes now =p
Atta boy. =P I don't think I'll be sleeping tonight..
Awe my poor cutie :(
Come heeeeeere
I wish but I'm passing out, good night sweetie, I love you, sleep tight, sweet dreams :)
I love you too. =) There are babies and puppies EVERYWHERE
What r ur plans for today? Wanna see the hobbit?
I'm physically free tonight, but I'm left without car.....I'll see if my mom will let me take hers
Unless there is a theater near u and I came to ur house
Never mind, Nicole doesn't need the car, I'm all yours tonight =)
Yay wanna pick a theater and a time?
Hazlet at 7?
Sounds good to me :)
Yay! How long is the movie? Haha
3 hours =p lol
Oh jeez, haha. ALL WORTH IT. I should be home a little after 5, will you have eaten dinner by then?
Probably not but I have no money =p
Ah, fair enough. If you wanna get dinner, I can spot you. If you don't want that, we'll just meet for the movie =P
Let's just meet for the movie and I'll eat before hand :)
Okay sweetie. =) I can spot you for movie, too!! I don't wanna make you broke
The world makes me broke =p
This is very true, I just have to figure out how to do that =p
Oh honey...it's okay. If you're a bike cop this summer, you'll have steady money!
Hmm, the Internet isn't really helping me right now....
And why is that? Lolz
I was looking up stuff for Oceangate bike cops, but nothing is coming up. And then I started looking up grad programs for myself because I'm a geek
Haha ur silly =p
How close are we to Monmouth U? Their program is awaiting accreditation in 2013
Pretty close really =p
Really!? I shall consider....and I'm well above the GPA requirement, so hey =P
Monmouth U should be pretty easy for u really lol
Yay safety school!!!
Lolz proud of u :)
You're too sweet, thanks =$
On my way to the theater now
I'm really sorry if I did something to make you not want to stay..
No not at all!!! I'm just tired thats all =p
Oh okay!! I feel better now....hahaha
Oh I'm sorry I made u feel bad, but I'm just tired that's all =p three times will do that =p
Oh, completely understandable.....I'm sorry
Indeed I'm glad u see the logic =p lolz
How could I not? Haha
There r some people =p
Those people are dumb and/or androids
Haha so what r u up to the rest of the night?
I'm somewhere between "working out because I desperately need to" and "sleeping because I desperately need to"
Hahaha well if u work out hard enough u might be able to make urself pass out, but as science has shown working out helps people to stay awake and feel alert afterwards, ur choice =p
Eh, not sure what I'm in the mood for. =p What about you? What are you up to?
I'm reading my book :)
How are you enjoying it? =)
It's so good!!! I'm enjoying it thoroughly :)
You're just so adorable right now!!!!!
I do my best but not really =p
You're spending your night curled up with a book about dwarves. Try to tell me that's not adorable
..... It's not adorable.....
SPITE SPITE SPITE SPITE SPITE SPITE SPITE SPITE!!!
You're lying!!!!! TO SPITE ME!!!!
.....Are you trying to anger me!?
FOR GIRDLEGARD!!!!!
It's the country that everyone lives in in the book =p
Oh, of course. How could I not know? =p
DUH!!!
I apologize for not being caught up in the dwarf world =p
How could u not!!!!!
I AM A BAD DWARF
U R A DISGRACE TO ALL THE CHILDREN OF VRACCAS!!!
....GET ME A PONY
WE DON'T HAVE ANY PONIES!!!
FINE THEN!!! But in all seriousness, I am exhausted and am going to sleep. Goodnight baby, I love you, sweet dreams! Enjoy your book =)
Good night cutie, I love you too, sleep tight, sweet dreams :)
Didn't sleep, finished the book like 15 minutes ago......
Honey!! Go to sleep!!!!!!!!!
Victory
You needed that sleep! Haha
So how's your night? I just left work =P
Over at frank's with joe, having a good ol' time =p
That sounds like a grand time! LoL? D&D?
HELL YEAH!!!
How did I know.... =P
Cause it's frank =p
Guess who got a new truck!! (Or, rather, is driving her dad's new truck so Nicole can take the car to her apartment)
......sure, Kevin
YES!!!!
I feel like you now, driving around a little pickup =p
Send my pictures!!!
I'm curled up in bed now and it's dark, I'll send in the morning =P
Awe ur adorable =p
Because I'm lazy and sleepy? Haha
Yes, that is precisely y =p
￼Pickem Junior
Awe how cute =p
=) So what's up!?
Came down the shore to clean up the shed and stuff, kinda chillin out right now, what r ur plans?
Nice! I'm at Nicole's for a bit, heading back to the house for family party.....if there weren't politics and Christie was actually allowed to come, I would tell you to come over =(
CRASHING!!!!
DO IT. YOU WON'T
It won't matter if you come after Nicole leaves =P
What kind of party r we talking here?
Haha. Not a big thing, just the Fallon's and cousins and food and stuffs
Awe how keen =p
KEEN!! HAHAHAHA
Is this gonna be an all day thingermajigger?
Eh, starts at 4, not really sure when it ends. Por que? =P
I was just curious in case u wanted to do something =p
I shall ask about it! What would you wanna do? And if not, I'm free Monday all day (and hopefully night!)
I mean I didn't really have anything in mind, I was just sayin =p
WE SHOULD GO ON A HEIST
...... Now don't talk business unless u wanna make a deal here =p
You think I kid...
Whatcha got in mind?
All I know is, it involves a monkey
......... I TOLD U BUSINESS ONLY!!!!!
That IS business. I don't know what you're talkin about
.....Everyone always asks about you, especially Diane =P
Should I come then? Lolz
And y isn't christie allowed?
Haha. Nicole would make a big stink because Christie wasn't allowed to come....but you would be.....
Because my dad is uncomfortable and thinks he'd have to explain their relationship to the family
Y would he, it's nicole's let her explain it =p
That's what I said, haha. But things are tense between the immediate family and I hate it
Awe I'm sorry cutie :(
It's all good, things are what they are and I don't think I can change them
This is true, just unfortunate =p
So you wanna come over? The whole gang is here, even the Prest Mills =P
Prest mills?
The cousins that never show up
Oooooo in that case I think I will, r u sure it's ok?
Of course! I just asked and my parents are more than happy to have you
Ok then I shall prepare at once for the journey!!
Huzzah!!!!
Leaving now
Okay sweetie! We will see you soon =)
Made it back :)
Yay! =) I don't know if I wanna sleep......sleep with meeeeee
I wish!!
I could just take the truck up to you and sneak in....
Feel free =p
Don't tempt me, I'm seconds away from doing it!!
Lolz it really wouldn't be a problem actually =p
Wait.....seriously?
Hi sweetie =)
Hi cutie :)
What's up?
Guys night :)
Aw fun! I'll let you go then, I'll talk to you later, enjoy =)
Ok cutie :)
I was going to ask if you wanted to hang out tonight, but I think I have to go into work for my on call =\
Laaaaaaaaaaame!!!
I wanna see my cutie before I'm a chipmunk -__-
Hehe chipmunk lol
Shaddup.....
I'm gonna bring u ice cream :)
Aw sweetie, you don't have to bring me anything!
But we can share the ice cream and have a fun time! :)
You are so, so freaking adorable
GUESS WHO DOESN'T HAVE TO GO IN
My cutie :)
Bingo! =) Actually, what is better for you, tonight or tomorrow night?
Doesn't make a difference to me =p
Okay! Actually I'm staying at Woodbridge on Tuesday, so if you're around, I would love to see you tonight =)
Sounds good to me :) whatcha wanna do?
Anything at all! I wanna go on an adventure! Lolol
Hmmmmm........ Adventures r hard to come by, maybe we could drive through union beach and see how the aftermath of sandy is going =p
How far is that from you?
The other side of the highway =p
So, close? Haha. I don't wanna put you out =p
Yeah it's pretty close =p
Okay! Thanks for putting up with my whims. =P where and when should I meet you?
My house whenever =p
Hmm....shall we say tentatively, 7?
Whatever u want sweetie :)
I just like you a lot... ☺
Where is my cutie?
On my way, be there in 5-10'
Made it back =)
Yay :)
Whoa!!!! And where exactly is that in reference to hayden?
25 minute walk, according to Google Maps. But if you're coming from Penn Station, it's just another two subway stops and a 5 minute walk
Not shabby I guess =p I'm happy for u :)
Admittedly, I may see if I can room swap for something closer......but thank you, I am happy too =)
Looks like we have another couple to double date with - my friend Lisa, who knows all of the non-city places in New York City, apparently
Whatever u want sweetie =p
Hahah....I just want you to enjoy yourself up in the city, and for you to meet mah new homies
Haha I will gladly meet ur new "homies" =p
It's mostly the NSSLHA EBoard......because you have a really cool girlfriend
Yeah I do!!
I was being sarcastic, don't mock me =p
MOCK MOCK MOCK MOCK MOCK MOCK!!!
Weep weep weep
Ur cute =p
Blah blah blah. =p So how's your day?
Goooooood read some of my book, hung out, now playing minecraft with dad :)
That sounds absolutely wonderful =)
It's fun :) how r u doing?
I'm just fine! Went into the city for work/socializing/advisor meeting. Now I'm at Woodbridge watching Tales of the Crypt =D
Oooooo sounds like a good time :)
Just heard a radio talk show saying how bacon is actually very good for you, in moderation.....thought of you =P
BACON!!!!!
BACON BACON BACON. Also, your brother is famous. Girl at work knows Bucky from World Cup
Haha what's her name, ill ask Bucky to sign something for her =p lol
The girl is Michele Miglino, she says he'd probably know her sister Elena?
Was she on a team at WC?
Elena was.....I remember her saying something about Starbrights???
I think u mean starlights, and idk if Bucky ever directly dealt with them but I can ask =p
Probably not, haha. But Michele was talking about the Shalkowskis, I asked if she knew Bucky....her face just lit up =P
Haha oh mom =p whats her relation to the shalkowskis?
She knows Stacy from World Cup, apparently =p
Wow that was a long time ago, I don't even remember Stacy being at world cup =p
And likewise, she didn't even know Bucky had siblings =P
Of course she didn't..... What else is new =p lol
Haha. It's okay, I like you guys plenty =p
But enough for the whole world!?!? Lolz
YES
ESPECIALLY YOU
Awe thanks cutie
No problem ☺
Isn't this the day they turn u into a chipmunk!?!?
￼Yup.....I've pretty much been sleeping till I got home
Awe my poor baby!!!!!
Hey, I get the day off, s'all good. Haha. How are you today?
Goooood =p I'd ask u how u r but I kinda already know lol
If you guessed sleepy, sore, or miserable, you guessed correctly. =p But these painkillers are aaweeeessssoome
Oh dear lord hahaha
Haha, what?!
Dose painkillers =p
Trolol. It'll be great once my second dose kicks in. Whatcha up to tonight?
Not much, just chillin out right now =p
Chillin like a villain? Jellin like a felon?
YUP, playin minecraft :)
Ooooooh, sounds fun! You should build a cat fountain!!
Nooooooo dad and I live in mt. Crumpet =p
I don't know what that means!!!
From the grinch!?
.....You made Minecraft like The Grinch!? THAT is awesome!
It just so happens there is a village near some mountains, so we made our home in the mountain =p
You guys are the best kind of family =P
We try :) TACOS!!!! How do u feel about sherbet ice cream tomorrow?
TACOS WHERE?! And sherbet ice cream sounds delicious. =) We already have a lot of regular ice cream, hahah
My mommy made tacos :)
Yummy yummy yummy!! Oh, solid food......
R u going to the zombie prom dinner thingy tomorrow night?
I would really like to.....it depends on how functional I am. Definitely can't drive though. Are you?
I think I wanna chill with my cutie and then see how we feel :)
You're cute. =) You are allowed to go without me,though, I don't wanna keep you from having fun =P
Hi sweetie, what time were you planning to come by today?
Like 4 ish?
Sounds good to me!
Maybe 3ish
Whenever is fine. I'll be here all day, haha
Still havnt gotten out of bed yet =p
Did I wake you up? I'm sorry =(
No I woke myself up =p
Okay good, haha. I know I always wake you up when we sleep together.....oooops
U wouldn't if werent snuggled up together, but I'm not complaining :)
I'll try to stay awake today, but I make no promises.....
I'm on my way now
Okay cutie =)
But they're doing dinner at 5ish...
K
Whatever you want to do if you don't feel like going then we won't go
Dad won't let me out, but you're more than welcome to go, I don't wanna stop you
Wilsee but I want to see my cutie
I want to see you too! Regardless, I'll be here all night, you can come whenever =)
Made it home! :)
Oh good! And I apologize for being a sleepy bore yesterday, but I'm glad you could come over, it was very nice =)
I'm glad too, I enjoy our time together :)
Gooooooooood and how r u feeling?
D'awww. =) How are you on this fine day?
Better! Officially only need Advil, my face is just a puffy square though
Awe my poor baby =p
Oh please, I am absolutely fine =P
Found a dress for wedding! Am I supposed to bring a gift?
U don't have to bring a gift no, send me a picture!!!!
Messed up the zipper so I'm fixing it now, I'll send when I'm done =)
How's your day going?
Just dandy, slept a lot since I stayed up all night last night lol
OoOoOoO, late night partying?
Partying as in being in a party to fight against the coming darkspawn armies for 12 hours straight then YES!!
.....AWW FREAKIN YEAH
Till the break'a'dawn!!!!!
Gotta tighten the straps cause it's falling, but this is the dress!
Idk if that's possible but whatever u say sweetie =p
NO
WHY
BECAUSE I LOVE YOU
WELL I LOVE YOU TOO. AND I LOVE YOU MORE.
Blah blah blah =p
I dooooo!!
I love you da mostest
You wanna fight, buddy?
Come at me brah =p
You haven't seen me fight....you'll regret that!!
U fight like a girl!!!!
I.....I do
YEAH
I've never actually fought before......
Yeah me neither lol
That's fine....we can just fight each other!!!
Of course!! It's the perfect solution =p
Genius!!! ....why am I so hungry....
Because u havnt been eating? Btw have u been on ur laptop today?
Yes and yes, why?
Am I still logged into minecraft on there?
Nope, at least you aren't right now
Don't know if u did something but it works now :)
I just reopened Minecraft.....sorry if I made it not work before
U fiiiine
My theatre class got cancelled, so I'm taking a jazz dance class in its place. I think I'm finally doing college correctly
Good for u sweetie I'm proud :)
Thanks cutie! =) How are you this morning?
Gooood, putting Christmas stuff away :) how r u doing?
I'm okay, been on and off asleep all day, but I have to go into work tonight =(
Awe lame!!
I'll live..... ALSO what are you doing the first or second weekend of February?
I don't have anything planned, what's up?
It's Off Broadway week and tickets are 2 for 1....I would love to see a show with you, if you would like ☺
That sounds wonderful :)
Yay!! Here are some shows: Avenue Q, Bare, Blue Man Group, Forbidden Broadway, Silence! The Musical, Stomp
Ooooo whats stomp?
It's like that cool street tap dancing show. With the trash cans and all that
That sounds pretty cool, I know the blue man group is freakin awesome though
I've heard awesome things about Blue Man Group, and I know it's actually pretty close to campus!
Oh yay!! Let's do that then :)
Sounds good to me! I will order tickets when I get in. =) 11:30pm shift, ending now.....yaaaaay
Awe my poor baby, good night sweetie, I love you, sleep tight, sweet dreams :)
You're beating me to bed? This is a first, haha. Goodnight, I love you too, sweet dreams =)
Idk what u r still doing up but I really need to switch my sleeping schedule around =p
I just got out of work, everyone went to IHOP! And right right, you have to get back to a school schedule =P
Yeah something like that =p what r u doing tomorrow?
Maybe we'll do something :)
On call for work, dentist appointment at 3:30....wide open after that, haha. What's up?
That sounds wonderful. =) Got anything in mind?
Nope, just like seeing my cutie :)
Teehee, you're cute. =P Let's see, do you have money?
I got a little, what's up?
Just trying to figure out possible plans! But I don't wanna bleed you dry
I got enough =p
Wanna grab a quick dinner? Hopefully I can eat solids
U sure that's a good idea? I don't wanna put u in pain or anything =p
Haha. If we go to like...th diner, I can get a milkshake! I've been dying to get out of the house...
Then I shall take u out of the house =p
TAKE ME AWAY FROM THIS PLACE!!
.......k...... I'm going to sleep, good night sweetie, I love u lots, sleep tight, sweet dreams :)
Haha, I'm sorry I'm like this. We'll iron things out tomorrow, I love you too =>
So when do u wanna grab dinner?
Ok sweetie :)
I'm just at the dentist, I'll be back before 5 for sure. Anytime after that is fine
Where do you wanna go? Anything with delicious soup and/or milkshakes is preferable
Why don't you choose since you have with the teeth problem
Hmm....is Freehold far from you?
Or eh, I dunno if I feel like going to Freehold. Wanna get that TGI Friday's we missed on Friday? LOLZ
I'm in freehold right now =p
Really! How long will you be there!?
Beats me, hanging out with Matt, Andrew and John at the moment =p
Okay! Let me know whenever you guys are done, we can get dinner/milkshakes at Cheeburger Cheeburger =)
Ok sweetie :)
What are you guys up to?
Bein geeky =p
This does not surprise me =P
Actually, if you can give me a half hours' heads up before you guys head out, that would be perfect
We're pretty close to heading out now
There is no cheeburger in redbank btw, wanna go to holmdel commons then?
I'm here :)
Be there in 10
￼Photo cube/coin box for school....look who's on the front side =)
Trolol
I don't know what's so funny =P
What is this for? Decoration in the dorm?
Yup yup, needed a container for spare change
Ur cute and I love you :)
I love you too! What brings this cuteness about...? Haha
I just wanted to remind u ☺ I'm going to sleep soon, I have an early morning tomorrow, gonna go work for my aunt in rosel park. She's doing 3 laminate floors in my aunt pat's house =p
Ooh, new laminate floors!! My little working man. =P I'm going into the city to put in a day at Neighborhood School, then stalking TJ at work cause he works very close to there =P
just had a delightful and enlightening lunch with TJ, LOLZ
Oh im glad! :) what were u enlightened about? Lol
And that was enlightening? I thought u already knew that stuff =p
We caught up on each other's lives, and then talked about all the past and present relationships of our friends circle =P
Well yeah, but I didn't know the perspectives and insights of others =P
Blah blah blah =p lolz
I found out our relationship actually outlasted everybody's expectations, though!! Haha
Hahaha well poop on their heads =p
THAT'S WHAT I SAID! I'm proud of us =P
Woop woop =p
How were your flooring adventures?
Aunt Anne changed her mind and we installed a door instead, I also fixed a different door and changed a fluorescent lightbulb, 10 hours of work, $100 made =p
Ooh, not bad at all! Baby you're a rich man =p
Hardly =p
Speaking of money....I'm looking up Broadway/Off Broadway Week tickets, and there are only SOME that are available/affordable.....like Blue Man Group's about $100 a piece with discount.....
Woof....
I am finding some shows, though, for less than half the price! Would you still be interested?
Sure I am :)
Okay! Umm first off, I figure weekends are best for you. Do you have any days that are preferable? (Friday 2/1, Sat 2/2, Fri 2/8, Sat 2/9)?
No not really =p
None of those days are your auditions, right? I thought it was around that time =P
Yeah I should probably find that out lolz
Thursday January 24 are auditions. I went on your page, clicked Reefer Madness Auditions, boom
Well BAM there's ur answer lolz
Haha. Okay! Saturdays seem like they'd be a better bet for you though, if you wind up having Friday rehearsals.....
True dat =p
Alright....affordable shows with weekend availability: Avenue Q, Bare, Stomp, Annie, Mary Poppins, Cinderella, Spidermab
Oooooo spiderman turn off the dark! That sounds pretty good, that or stomp ==
I was curious about Spider-Man! I'll see what we've got for Saturday 2/2....
Oh wait damnit they don't have two adjacent seats
Really? That blows!! :(
Unless I pay about $300 altogether.... =\ Let's try Stomp?
Ok :)
Two tickets for Stomp on Saturday 2/2 at 8pm =)
Ok!! How much money r we talking?
No worries!
U r not paying for both our tickets!!
Please, it really wasn't even all that much! Just cover your transportation costs =)
NO!!!
Okay. Transportation costs and dinner, and then it's about even
Everything 50/50 minus transportation
Okay, your ticket was $35 =P
That's what I like to hear lol
I wanted to treat you...
Summer!? I mean *winter break
Maybe I should get a job there.... Lolz
Ha lolz
I have pull at EB, I'm pretty sure they're gonna fire one of the back room guys cause he's terrible =P
Is it Friday yet?? I can't fall asleep and it would be much easier with you here ☺
Awe I know how u feel, it would be wonderful :)
=) And I can't wait to kiss you again (properly - I'm at 100 percent functionality again!)
Oh yay!! I'm glad :) I like it when my cutie is healthy and adorable but ur adorable all the time so that doesn't really count =p
Oh stop it, you =A&P
=A&P?
Lolz ur silly =p
Oh, that was supposed to be a =P face, spelling is hard
YOU'RE silly! Ah, the theatre bug is biting again and I'm trying to figure out a stand by monologue for next semester....
Idk what im doing for reefer =p
Maybe I will........
I desperately wish I could do the opening monologue from Dr. Horrible =P
It's a fun one, how long does it have to be?
Like 30 seconds maybe? Probably shorter =p
Timed it out, from the opening laugh to "....so fingers crossed" is about 50 seconds =P
What time should I get to your house tomorrow?
That's a good question, when did we decide the wedding was?
Wedding is at 6:30, but we weren't sure if Dylan would make us come early with him
Right and he most likely is not so we should leave here by like 5ish
No problem, I'll leave my house at 4 =)
Sounds like a plan :)
=) So whatcha up to?
Minecraft with the family :) what about u?
Aww fun! I'm just going to dinner with Laura and Jules, hoping it's an early night cause I'm sleepy....haha
Lolz ur cute =p
Should I bring anything to Ocean Gatev?
Pj's..... Anything else u want? Lolz
I'm gonna bring an anvil
I dare u
You think I won't....OH!! I just got an email about a staged reading, I may get to perform after all =pp
YAY!! :)
Haha....but I'd have to skip my dance class for the performance.....think that's bad?
One class or the entire thing?
Thats not bad at all
Just one class
Then screw it! Haha. Wednesday nights are hard for you to get into NYC, right?
Not really, just rehearsal probably, what's up?
Cause if I get in the show, it's Wednesday the 13th =P
Then I shall do all I can do be there :)
Aw cutie, you need not miss rehearsal!! I don't even know if it'll come through
At any rate I shall be there if it happens =p
Woop woop
